function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding how building design influences indoor microbiome","Impact":"Increased risk of creating indoor environments conducive to the propagation of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Conducting further research on the relationship between building design and indoor microbiome to inform better design practices","Technologies":"Microbiological and architectural data collection and analysis tools","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially in multi-use spaces","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Variation in indoor bacterial communities based on building design choices","Impact":"Potential for unequal distribution of microbial biodiversity in indoor spaces, leading to the prevalence of specific disease-causing microorganisms","Mitigation":"Implementing design choices informed by microbiological data to promote a more balanced indoor microbiome","Technologies":"Microbiological data collection and analysis tools, environmental monitoring devices","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially in multi-use spaces","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding how different building functions and space types influence indoor microbiome","Impact":"Potential for creating indoor environments that favor the proliferation of certain disease-causing microorganisms in specific spaces","Mitigation":"Conducting studies to identify the microbiological implications of different building functions and space types, and using findings to inform design and operation practices","Technologies":"Microbiological data collection and analysis tools, environmental monitoring devices","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially in multi-use spaces","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and facility managers"}]}
